attributes.action: Reduce money being poured into NHS, Schools and Local Council
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With the massive investment over the past 10 years in the NHS, are we really getting value for money. I ask the Prime Minister and His government to reduce funding to the NHS, Schools and Local Councils. Make them reduce the amount of needless staff and resources. This will lead to a reduction in our taxes especially our extortionate council tax.
We want lower taxes and public workers to actually earn their money. Pouring endless amounts of cash into a system does not mean it will become better or more efficient.
